org.appkit.util
Class SmartExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.appkit.util.SmartExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executor
public final class SmartExecutor
extends Object
implements Executor

An Executor that provides commonly-used methods for running Runnables and is a Throttle. It uses a Scheduler-Thread to schedule and run tasks.

Method Summary
 void cancelRepeatingRunnable(Runnable runnable)
          cancel a scheduled repeating runnable

 void scheduleAtFixedRate(long period, TimeUnit timeUnit, Runnable runnable)
          schedule a Runnable to be executed using a fixed delay between the end of a run and the start of the next

Method Detail

create

public static SmartExecutor create()
creates a new SmartExecutor with a cached thread-pool. It has to be shutdown after use.
